function.name: random
function.description: Returns a randomized value based on the optional parameter value. If an integer argument N is provided the return value is a random integer between 0 and N. If a list argument L is provided it is a random entry from the list. If no parameter is provided, a random floating point number between 0 and 1 will be generated.

example.description: Roll a 6-sided die three times and print the results:

examples.example:
System.print(Math.random (6)+1)
Note: the + 1 is needed, because the result of random is 0 to 6, but not including 6.
